channel.title: How can i add dragon claws to itemdef.java?
channel.description:
pretty straight forward.. Anyone know how?
It'd be really nice if someone could answer steps on how to add it, or where to get the codeing for it aswell.. ughh

item.title: How can i add dragon claws to itemdef.java?
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

Add the models to the model/Raw folder, add the item ints to Itemdef.java, then add the item stats to item.cfg.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i add dragon claws to itemdef.java?
